I visited on October 2, 2025, and had an excellent experience. The food and service were both top-notch! I ordered the chicken and waffles, as well as the lamb over rice, both dishes were absolutely delicious and full of flavor.

A big thank you to Angel, Admid, and Jorge, they were incredibly kind, welcoming, and made the visit even more enjoyable. You can really tell they care about the customers.

This is definitely the place to go if you‚Äôre craving amazing food at an affordable price. It‚Äôs become my go-to spot whenever I want a quick, satisfying meal. Highly recommend!

Angel was very courteous and friendly. He gave me a tender to try because I was undecided to what i wanted to order.  I decided for the tender. Very juicy and crispy. Shawn was also great. He helped and assisted with angels orders. He packed them very well. Will be visiting soon. Thank you guys üòä omg, I forgot to add their strawberry cheese cake is sooooo good üëçüèæ

Came here today to try some new food in the bronx, i definitely recommend. The burgers were fire plus free soda!!! The milkshake was alrightt but i am definitely coming back for more. Our best $30 spent here.

Friendly staff, clean place, great tasting food but what's really disappointing is the portion..actually not the whole portion but quantity of meat was on a very low side. Brothers filled the plate with rice and much less meat on top, if I knew it before I would definitely pay extra on top of almost $12 I paid and get a decent amount of meat as I'm not interested in eating lots of rice and and bread with salad and sauces.

Amazing experience at Blazin Chicken & Gyro! Angel and George provided absolutely top-tier service from start to finish. Not only was the service incredibly fast, but they were both so friendly and welcoming. It‚Äôs rare to find staff who are both efficient and genuinely nice. They made sure everything was perfect and really went above and beyond. The food was great, but the exceptional service from Angel and George made this visit truly memorable. Highly recommend stopping by ‚Äì you won‚Äôt be disappointed!

I recently visited an amazing food place that truly exceeded my expectations. The moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and attentive service. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that every part of my dining experience was perfect.

The food itself was absolutely delicious‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Every dish felt thoughtfully prepared, and it was clear that quality and care were top priorities. Combined with the outstanding customer service, it made for a memorable experience that I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a top-notch dining spot.

I just wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude to Alex! When I visited, he was incredibly positive and friendly, and he even took the time to ask me my name. That truly touching no lie because I‚Äôve come here numerous times and I always remember who goes above and beyond to help, especially when we know our community. Alex was incredibly attentive to all the clients, and I truly appreciate that first impression. The food was absolutely delicious, and the staff was super friendly and helpful. Overall, it was an amazing experience. We desperately need more individuals like Alex in our community. This area would be a much happier place with more smiles! Thanks again for the exceptional service!

Dining experiences are often remembered not only for the food, but for the quality of service and on that front, George delivers excellence of the highest standard. From the moment I arrived, he extended a warm welcome that was both professional and genuinely heartfelt. His attentiveness, polished manner, and ability to anticipate needs without being prompted elevated the experience far beyond expectation.

George demonstrates an impressive balance of elegance and efficiency ensuring every guest feels valued, respected, and well cared for. He represents the true essence of hospitality, transforming a simple visit for halal and fried chicken into an experience one would expect at the finest establishments.

It is rare to encounter service delivered with such poise, grace, and consistency. George is, without question, an asset to this restaurant, and I would highly recommend anyone visiting to experience his exceptional standard of care.

Not every falafel hits the spot, but Blazin Chicken & Gyro‚Äôs? That‚Äôs the kind of flavor I crave with the same intensity as a PMS snack attack‚Äîzero chill, full obsession.

Since I‚Äôm not a lamb person, I only asked falafel and chicken for my mix gyro and with some white sauce. Definitely not your standard serving size. It‚Äôs a meal and a half! Yet, I ate like I‚Äôd been jackhammering concrete since sunrise. üòÖ

Just writing this feedback has me drooling ü§§

Customer service is impeccable food here has been a must have and angel has even. One in on his day off to give me a especially guided and highly recommended lemonade ask for the angel special when you go üíõ‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è

Exceptional Dining Experience!
I'm thoroughly impressed with the service here! George and the entire team provide top-notch service, making every visitor feel welcome. The halal dishes are flavorful and authentic, offering great variety. Highly recommend for halal food lovers seeking quality and warm service! #HalalFood #GreatService

Alex, George, and Jose were amazing! They went above and beyond to make sure everything went smoothly and made me feel taken care of the whole time. Their professionalism and friendliness really stood out, and it made the experience even better. I truly appreciate the great service and would definitely recommend them to anyone

Out of this freaking world!!! Staying nearby for work and stumbled upon this magnificent place! It is so good that I have eaten here for two days and have no desire to try anything else. The food is just that good!! Definitely must try!!!
Ultimate late night spot to go eat. Food is amazing and they have a vast of options to choose from. Service is fast and food is super delicious. Not to forget this place is HALAL.

I just want to take a moment to thank Angel for providing truly outstanding service. I ordered the chicken and waffles and it was really fresh. Angel made it. He was genuinely helpful since this was my first time. It‚Äôs rare to come across someone who not only takes pride in their work but also goes above and beyond to make sure everything runs smoothly.

I recently had the pleasure of visiting and was incredibly impressed by the service. Angel Ahmed and George provided amazing customer service, going above and beyond to ensure everything went smoothly. Their professionalism and friendly approach made the experience truly enjoyable. The environment itself was welcoming and comfortable, enhancing the overall visit. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for excellent service in a great atmosphere.

Angel and George offer outstanding customer service, making every visit a delightful experience. Their attentive and friendly staff ensure that guests feel welcomed and valued. The food quality is excellent, with fresh ingredients and flavorful dishes that keep customers coming back. Overall, Angel and George are committed to providing a warm, inviting atmosphere paired with top-notch service and delicious food.
The food was amazing, the service couldn‚Äôt have been better, and Angel made us feel right at home.
I love coming to Blazin! I always ordered over the phone because I work in the area and Angel is always so pleasant and Ayleen is patient when taking my order. You‚Äôll never be disappointed!
Shawn and angel ALWAYS give me exceptional service. I usually am very picky when eating out but this is my go to spot. A1 food and they are super clean and fast and everything is always well seasoned

Angel and Ahmed are the coolest guys ever serving me! Food is always bomb when I come here late night. 10/10 Recommend. Fried chicken gyro BALID
CRISPY DRY HOT WINGS BALIDDDDD
FRIED SHRIMP BALIDDDD
RICE 7.5/10

also mix all 3 fountain juices together

To me Blazin chicken & Gyro is the upgraded version of a chicken spot. I‚Äôve tried different dishes such as fried shrimp, whitening fish, french fries, fruity pebbles belgian waffles, samosas and fish platter. I got to tell you everything was amazing. So yummy and delicious. Oh my gosh you guy‚Äôs need to try there sauces, you won‚Äôt regret it. I like how friendly the staff is. They always do a great job and make me feel comfortable even though the location is in a bad ghetto environment. I‚Äôm going to keep coming back here because it is so worth it üôÇ
Staff is friendly and efficient, food is always good. Menu is clear and visible. Place is clean and organized. Salito fries with chicken pictured

I recently visited Blazing Chicken & Gyro, and I was really impressed! The service was fast, which is exactly what you want when you're on the go. The food was fresh and flavorful definitely exceeded my expectations I tried their chicken tenders , and it was delicious; the flavors were spot on and everything was cooked perfectly. Plus, the staff was friendly George Alex & Jose , which made the experience even better.
Best food for as a late night option, great service provided by angel and George , good clean environment highly recommend

George had no idea who I was. But his service was unbelievable and extremely unique. He has a wonderful way of communicating with the community and explained the menu very well. The food was delicious! A must have! The sauces are perfect . I‚Äôm going to get chicken and waffles next time !
Angel was very polite and took my order accurately. Jeffrey was also very helpful and nice.

Excellent customer service clean establishment fast paced goes above and beyond ain‚Äôt cheap on portions either. Great food. Angel and Eileen two wonderful employees really know the definition of what it means to be personable and build a relationship with a customer
Waiting 20 minutes for fried chicken and fries is ridiculous. It made me late getting back to the office. Definitely warning my coworkers to avoid this place.
Angel and Ilene are so sweet and always make sure I have what I need when I visit I love my lemon pepper wings they are my favorite from this spot  . Thank you guys

üó£them Blazin chicken tender are on point especially when they fresh from the fryer!üì∏ü§§‚úåüèøüëåüèøüí™üèøüí™üèø Angel and Ahmed & George are very professional when they serve my food and take my orders!!!
Combo platter was good. Food tasted fresh. Falafel was fresh and not stale. I would definitely eat here again
Ahmad, George, And Mohammed are very friendly, best customer service you could ask for ü©µ.

When this location first opened, service and food quality were great. Unfortunately, that has changed. I request fresh fries every time I visit or call in an order‚Äîand almost every time, I‚Äôm given old, soggy fries that were clearly sitting in a warmer. I always return the plate and ask for fresh fries, and I‚Äôm repeatedly told they are ‚Äúfresh,‚Äù when they are not.

Most recently, I asked an employee to feel the fries himself, and he agreed they weren‚Äôt fresh. I was issued a refund‚Äîbut this has become a regular issue. One employee in particular (glasses, long hair) has been consistently rude and combative when I‚Äôve simply asked for my food to be made the way I request. This is unacceptable behavior from staff, especially when the issue is on their end.

Other locations across New Jersey get it right with no problem. I‚Äôm not looking for compensation‚ÄîI just want my food made correctly the first time. A couple of staff members here have handled things professionally, but the recurring poor service and refusal to prepare food properly shows a clear lack of quality control and staff training at this location.

Until management addresses these issues, I can‚Äôt recommend this location.

Une vraie p√©pite ! Ce fast-food est bien plus qu‚Äôun simple endroit pour manger : accueil hyper chaleureux, √©quipe aux petits soins et surtout une nourriture d√©licieuse et g√©n√©reuse. On s‚Äôy sent bien d√®s la premi√®re minute. Je recommande les yeux ferm√©s !

First time ever, read the reviews. I had to try it.  Got an order of regular chicken with French fries. Chicken I got was  super crispy, the flavor was good nothing compared to like Dominican crispy fried chicken, it's more unique but still delicious with the white sauce, it's so good. The fries were right on point. It's also served with bread.

Blazin Chicken and Gyro is always a great experience! Angel takes amazing care of me every time I come in‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and consistent. The food never disappoints, and the lamb salad is absolutely delicious. Fresh, flavorful, and always hits the spot. Definitely one of my go-to places!

Delicious food and great service from an amazing guy from Texas at the till, who kindly offered us free water and sauces. I rated the atmosphere 4 stars only because there were no tables to sit at. Highly recommended ‚Äì from a Turkish guy with Turkish bills in his wallet.

My wife and i were looking for a location that would provide that authentic chicken over rice halal food in the city, without having to stand on a line for hrs at a  food truck location in Manhattan. And through Google search we discovered this location..Blazin Chicken & Gyro, their classic chicken over rice hit the spot!! The plate was substantial, the pics shows how much food we were given. The chicken was very moist and flavorful. The rice was perfectly cooked, light & fluffy, not hard or dry, and seasoned which is very important(most places give you a bland cooked rice and shower it with sauce),and with the right amount of sauce made this plate very enjoyable to the pallet. The veggies were bright and crisp, the pita bread was light, soft and very tasty on it's own. And lastly the price wasn't exaggerated.(I've paid more for worst and less food). I'd highly recommend this location for great food, friendly service and decent pricing. Thank you Blazin Chicken & Gyro for having great food in the neighborhood!
The food was amazing. The service was great! The atmosphere isn‚Äôt so good when you got homeless people outside but what can you do? Give them some change!

It is a chicken spot like some have stated, but the food is good. The fried chicken and fries were greasy. The shrimp were a decent size, and they are seasoned. The lamb gyro is good. The prices are not bad either.  This is a good spot for a late night meal

George Jeffery Ahmed and levi was phenomenal. Make sure you guys come when they are here. Got my order fast and correct. They are super friendly and I would come back a million times over and over again.
Great food right near my house I‚Äôm always ordering

The customer service is horrible, I order a mixed platter and they just threw in there like it was just garbage or something. See picture for context.
Also, the food was tasty but bad. It made me VERY VERY VERY SICK!
I also got a chance to see how they keep the food in back and I noticed they use the same utensils for different things without properly washing it to prevent cross contamination! Don‚Äôt eat here, you‚Äôll stomach will get sick. And when I complaint to the owner he didn‚Äôt even care to refund me my money or anything!
